MainPanel.Item: Crie e lance seu próprio software
Veja a lista de produtos que possui
Assumir um contrato de trabalho. Desenvolver software pode ficar caro, assumir o trabalho de contrato para fazer algum dinheiro rápido por outro lado.
Gerencie seus servidores e re-delegue os processos
Veja a lista de seus funcionários
Procurar, entrevistar e contratar novos funcionários
Gerencie suas equipes, defina horas de trabalho e delegue responsabilidade
Contrate ou ligue para o pessoal para garantir que suas instalações sejam de alto nível
Põr o dinheiro em sua conta do seguro para atrair empregados melhores e para fazer o dinheiro gerar juros
Compra e venda de ações, há muito dinheiro a ser feito aqui
Se você estiver enfrentando problemas, você pode querer considerar tomar um empréstimo
Revise a lista de todos os softwares já lançados
Mantenha-se atualizado sobre eventos atuais e opiniões de produtos
Gerencie como deseja distribuir seu software
Mostra/esconde todos os móveis que estão presos ao teto
Mostra/esconde legendas sobre as salas, especificando a equipe a que pertencem e quais as limitações de uso aplicáveis
Use isso para conectar seus servidores
Clique aqui para fazer a cor do quarto refletir o status atual da sala
Clique aqui para alternar o modo de construção, no qual você pode construir e fornecer seu escritório(s) e construir estradas e estacionamento
Se ninguém estiver por perto, você pode pular até que alguém chegue
Construa salas, portas, elevadores e janelas
Coloque vários móveis em suas salas para torná-los funcionais
Construir estradas e estacionamentos para fazer a viagem diaria para trabalhar mais rápido para seus funcionários

DesignWindow.Item: Tenha todo o código sincronizado em um só lugar, o que reduz os bugs e torna seus programadores mais eficientes durante a fase alfa. Requer um servidor.
Faça deste produto uma sequência de outro produto seu
Clique aqui para gerar um nome aleatório
Libere seu produto gratuitamente para ganhar popularidade e colocar uma pressão sobre seus concorrentes
Mantenha este produto apenas com você, para que seus concorrentes não possam aproveitá-lo

AutoWindow.Item: Para isso, o líder da equipe deve ter feito um curso de gerenciamento de projetos através do programa de educação
Para isso, o líder da equipe deve ter feito um curso de gestão de RH através do programa de educação

EducationWindow.Item: Gerenciamento de projetos Permite que um líder para assumir um ciclo de desenvolvimento através da concepção de novos produtos e automaticamente delegar trabalho para equipes específicas.
Permite o gerenciamento para o líder de RH para assumir as responsabilidades de RH, como contratação, demissão, resolução de litígios, demitir e educação.

InsuranceWindow.Item: Seguro de saúde: (Atrai funcionários de jovens)
Seguro de vida: (atrai funcionários de meia idade)

OptionsWindow.Item: Pulará automaticamente para a próxima chegada de um funcionário se não houver ninguém presente
Salva uma vez por mês sem sobrescrever o arquivo de salvamento principal
Mexerá a câmera quando o mouse ficar na borda da tela
Espera a taxa de atualização da tela para renderizar. Remove o rasgo da tela e evita o superaquecimento.
O ambiente exterior projeta sombras com base na posição do sol
Cada luz no jogo lança sombras (requer uma placa gráfica potente)
Adiciona sombras aos cantos e fendas
Barra da parte superior e inferior da tela para dar um efeito em miniatura
Adiciona um ligeiro brilho e aumenta a força da cor
Mover a câmara para a frente
Mover a câmera para a esquerda
Mover a câmera para a direita
Girar a câmera para a esquerda
Girar a câmera para a direita
Velocidade do jogo muito mais rápidad

Thoughts.Item: I have too many jobs at once
I'm not happy with how the last wage negotiations went
I'm very happy with my salary
There is too much noise in this room
The room is nice and quiet
I can't concentrate with other teams around me all the time
I didn't get the salary I wanted

Warnings.Item: Some employees are unhappy with their job
An employee is hungry and is having trouble working
An employee has to pee and is having trouble working
An employee is tired and can't work
An employee is freezing
An employee is hot
An employee stumbling in the dark. Build more lamps or windows
An employee is grossed out by their office
A room is dirty and needs cleaning up
An employee is complaining about a slow computer. Make sure computers are in top shape by hiring IT support
An employee is having trouble concentrating due to noise. Reduce all sources of noise in a room or build cubicles
There are too many teams in one of your rooms. Divide your rooms or build cubicles
You can't afford this
The busses are filling up, consider building parking
Click and drag
There is no way to get in to this room Add doors or elevators

There is not enough light here Add windows or lamps
Some inventory broke and needs maintenance
The structure is not supported
You can't build on top of roads
You can't build within other rooms. If you want to split a room you have to build from wall to wall
You have to build within your plot boundaries
Your rooms have to be at least 2x2

You have to place this on a room boundary

You have to place this at a table

UI.Item:
Clique com o botão esquerdo do mouse em um servidor para selecioná-lo e clique em outro servidor para conectá-lo.
Clique com o botão esquerdo em qualquer outro lugar ou clique duas vezes para desconectar o servidor.
Clique com o botão direito para desmarcar e cancelar.
Clique aqui quando estiver pronto para o seu primeiro dia
Clique e arraste para girar seus móveis

Alpha4.1.Item: Are you sure you want to
Increases the ability to bring together a team, boost their stats and handle management tasks
Increases how fast and the amount of quality the programmer can add and how quickly bugs are fixed
Increases the speed of finishing design work and makes the employee better at stopping before a design gets too complex
Increases how fast and the amount of quality the artist can add to a product and how quickly flaws are fixed
Increases the effectiveness and speed of marketing campaigns and company reputation bonuses
Some of your electronics are being affected by the heat
Put ventilators in full cool mode to preserve electronics

Alpha4.3.Item: If a product is affecting your reputation or you can't support it, it might be a good idea to pull it off the market. It can affect your reputation.

Alpha4.5.Item: {0} has been in an accident and has resigned!
Some electronic equipment broke and needs IT-support

Alpha4.6.Item: There is no privacy in the bathroom
I need health insurance if I get hurt

This room is boring to look at
You have furniture that your staff is unable to reach

Are you sure you want to end the delay phase? Ending the delay phase prematurely will often extend the beta phase due to the amount of additional bugs.

Alpha4.7.Item: The size of the team you've chosen is quite large for a project of this size Are you sure you want to continue?
You're cloning a large amount of stuff, which could overwhelm your computer. Are you sure you want to continue?
Staff is unable to reach this {0} Make sure nothing is in the way
This parking spot cannot be reached Make sure it is connected to the main road
{0} cannot get home Make sure there is a path out of the building with nothing blocking the way

Are you sure you want to accept all demands? The raises averages {0}, which is a net change of {1} per month
{0} employee(s) waiting to use
Upcoming events
Click here to see a list of events coming up next month. The icon will glow red if very important events are happening.
{0} from team {1} will retire next month, after working for {2} for {3} years.
{0} have planned vacations next month and {1} employees are scheduled to hold their vacation.
No teams have planned vacations next month but {0} employees are scheduled to hold their vacation.
{0} plans to release a product of type {1} called "{2}" next month.
An error occured!
Click here for details

I'm sorry to inform you that an error occured just now, which might cause the game to break or become unstable (Early access, right?). If you have a recent save, I would suggest closing the game, re-opening it and then loading it, as you might not be able to save the current game as of now. If you have an idea of what happened based on the error message (click the "See error" button to check) and you can reproduce it, I would be very grateful if you could send a mail to SoftwareInc@Coredumping.com with a description of the error, so that I may fix it. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience.

Alpha6.11.Item: Super-sampling antialiasing renders the game in double resolution to smooth out edges as much as possible (Requires a high-end graphics card)

Alpha7.1.Item: Fans have no direct impact on your sales, but having more fans will make it easier to gain market recoginition.
This is your reputation in the software industry. Each star will affect the quality of employee applicants, contracts, deals and distribution.
Click here to use the suggested price for this software
Your market recognition controls how well known you are in each software market and therefore how well your products will sell in each category
Makes most shiny surfaces reflect their surroundings (Requires a high-end graphics card)
Error taking picture. Please pick a smaller resolution.
The performance of most of the effects depend on your screen resolution and not the complexity of the objects on the screen. SSAA will double the performance impact of most of the effects.
Do you want to start a marketing campaign for {0} now? Marketing your product while it is under development will generate hype, which affects your launch sales and your competitors
There is already a marketing campaign for this product
"{0}" is already bound to "{1}", are you sure you want to rebind?
The game you tried to load was from an older version of Software Inc. ({0}), which is no longer compatible with the version you are using ({1})

Alpha7.2.Item: Fast Approximate Anti-Aliasing, basic anti-aliasing. Keeps edges from looking pixelated
Subpixel Morphological Anti-Aliasing, more advanced anti-aliasing. Keeps edges from looking pixelated
Subpixel Morphological Anti-Aliasing, not supported on DirectX9
Super-Sampling Anti-Aliasing. Renders the game in higher resolution to smooth out edges as much as possible (Requires a high-end graphics card)
Are you sure you want to cancel {0}?

Alpha7.3.Item: A computer is getting very slow and needs to be looked at by IT support staff

Alpha7.5.Item: {0} wants {1}, which you cannot afford it

Alpha7.6.Item: You have already wasted all your lives
Only recommended for small projects when starting out

Click to start
Connect the boxes until all boxes in a group show 0
You can't connect the same boxes twice
You can make loops
Don't let a box get to the center

Click to start
Type the words on the screen
You have to type the entire word once you start typing, you can't delete a letter
When you complete a word, your score multiplier increases
The multiplier resets when you mistype a letter or when a word reaches the bottom
Don't let the words reach the bottom

Alpha7.7.Item: Are you sure you want to look again? It will cost {0}

Alpha8.1.Item: This feature depends on {0}, please select that feature first
This feature depends on {0} from {1}, which has not unlocked yet
This feature depends on {0} from {1}, which is not available on the market
This feature depends on {0}, which is not available for the {1} you have picked
All supported operating systems must have {0} to unlock this feature
It's been awhile since you released a product of type {0}({1}) and your fans are noticing
Research and patent features to make royalties off your competitors
Are you sure you want to cancel this research? You will lose all progress
Your patent on {1} for {0} has expired
Another company has finished researching {1} from {0} before you
Whether to force employees to only work in their strongest role
How long to wait between education. Use a negative number to allow several courses at once

Alpha8.2.Item: There is currently nothing to research

Alpha8.3.Item: Wall angle has to be larger than {0}°
You can assign employees to furniture by holding shift and selecting both the employee(s) and the furniture and then right clicking
You can assign staff to rooms by holding shift and selecting both the staff member(s) and the room(s) and then right clicking
You can keep placing objects and rooms in build mode by holding shift, this also works when duplicating objects
You can easily select multiple objects of a specific type by holding ctrl and the left mouse button while dragging the mouse
The select furniture type option is extremely versatile, you can use it to select all furniture in a room or the selected furniture type(s) in the selected room(s)
You can easily copy furniture color by setting the default style and then resetting style for selected furniture from the context menu
Keep an eye on upcoming and recently released products before releasing your own to avoid getting overshadowed
You can copy multiple objects in an arrangement at a time by holding shift and selecting them before duplicating
You can educate multiple employees at a time by having them all selected before you open the education window
You can hold ctrl and click to select multiple employees or hold shift to select a range of employees, which also works for some other lists in the game
For some wall segments, you can hold ctrl to auto scale the segment to fit the wall you want to build it on

Alpha8.4.Item: You can select elevators in build mode to show a guiding beam, which will help you align elevators on other floors
HR for team {0} does not have a budget big enough to hire more employees
This product is not operating system dependant
This software depends on {1} to be developed. Please select a product of type {1} to continue
You need at least one feature to begin development

Alpha8.5.Item: You can use the "Anchor grid" button, above the build button on the left, to snap the grid to a wall. This makes it a lot easier to align furniture to angled walls

Alpha8.6.Item: Click here to start uploading your mods to the Steam Workshop
Failed uploading mod with error code: {0}
Mod uploaded successfully! Remember to change the visibility of your mod in the workshop.
You do not have permission to upload this mod to the Steam Workshop
Found file of type {0}. Please only upload relevant files
Are you sure you want to upload this to the Steam Workshop? Please refrain from uploading work that is not yours.
You can left click and drag work items to re-order them in the list. You can right click a work item to collapse it.

Alpha8.7.Item: Please pick a name for your blueprint
Choose from a list of pre-made and pre-furnished buildings
Please unsubscribe from this item in the Steam Workshop. If you uploaded this to the Workshop, please delete it manually from the Blueprints folder.

Alpha8.8.Item: Would you like to begin the {0} tutorial?
Are you sure you want to cancel the tutorial?
The selected mod is not compatible with the other mods selected

Alpha8.9.Item: An employee is stressed. Make sure you don't overwork them with too many tasks and long working hours, build a canteen and send them home when they are completely stressed out
An employee is not having their social needs met. An open working environment, canteens, team meetings and furniture for socializing can help
A good leader needs to be social, but an independant employee will happily work all day by themselves in their booths
A lazy employee will try to get out of work as much as possible, whereas a stressed employee will quickly feel overworked
A hard worker always gives it 110%, but a fast learner will pick up new skills more easily
You are about to start deveping an in-house product, which means you won't be able to sell it or license it. Are you sure you want to continue?
Press {0} or {1} to rotate the buliding

Alpha8.10.Item: Algo está bloqueando sua equipe de limpeza limpar esta sala
Colocar mais pessoas em um projeto do que o necessário não faz necessariamente o desenvolvimento ir mais rápido e pode realmente diminuir a eficácia
You can configure a keyboard shortcut to fire employees and destroy objects. The default is the DELETE key
Failed saving game with error message: {0}
This split would result in unsupported rooms
Failed activating mod. Check log for details.
Are you sure you want to delete the blueprint: {0}?
Are you sure you want to disband the team: {0}?
You can change lighting conditions in build mode in the bottom left corner below the categories. This will also allow you to see your lamps in action.
A cook is unable to find a stove. Make sure you have one for each cook and at least one fridge and serving tray
You can't redelegate a server process to the server it is already on
Digite um endereço de e-mail válido ou deixe o campo vazio
Falha no envio do relatório. Você quer tentar mais tarde? Erro:
Escreva pelo menos 50 letras na sua mensagem
O jogo detectou um acidente na sua última execução, você quer notificar o desenvolvedor agora?
O jogo detectou um erro, você deseja notificar o desenvolvedor agora?
(OPCIONAl) Permite-me entrar em contato com você para mais informações
Digite sua mensagem para o desenvolvedor aqui(em inglês)
Seu relatório foi salvo e será repetido na próxima vez que você iniciar o jogo
Você só pode enviar um relatório uma vez a cada 5 minutos

Falha ao guardar o jogo. O jogo continuará, mas você pode ter um comportamento estranho ou perda de dados. O erro foi registrado. Deseja também enviar um relatório de erro para o desenvolvedor? Desculpe pela inconveniência.

Falha ao carregar o jogo. O jogo continuará, mas você pode ter um comportamento estranho ou perda de dados. O erro foi registrado. Deseja também enviar um relatório de erro para o desenvolvedor? Desculpe pela inconveniência.

Alpha8.11.Item: Um móvel chamado {0} não estava presente no seu computador. O jogo terá de carregar o seu arquivo de salvar sem este mobiliário, que pode buga o jogo.
